module.title: CSS Layout: Flexbox & Grid
module.description: Master modern layout techniques with Flexbox and CSS Grid

lessons.title: Display & Position
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `display`: `block`, `inline`, `inline-block`, `none`, `flex`, `grid`
- `position`: `static`, `relative`, `absolute`, `fixed`, `sticky`
- `relative` + `absolute` combo for positioning children
- `z-index` controls stacking order

---

# Display & Position

lessons.title: Flexbox
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `display: flex` on parent makes children flex items
- `justify-content` for main axis alignment
- `align-items` for cross axis alignment
- `flex-direction`: `row` (default) or `column`
- `gap` adds space between items

---

# Flexbox

lessons.title: CSS Grid
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- `display: grid` creates a grid container
- `grid-template-columns` defines columns
- `fr` unit: fraction of available space
- `gap` for gutters between cells
- `grid-column: span 2` for spanning

---

# CSS Grid

lessons.title: Responsive Design
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Media queries: `@media (min-width: 768px) {}`
- Mobile-first: start with small screens, add breakpoints
- `max-width` prevents content from stretching too wide
- `min-width` breakpoints: 640px (sm), 768px (md), 1024px (lg)

---
